content.title: Container
content.description: A component for fixing an element's width to the current breakpoint.

content.title: Box Decoration Break
content.description: Utilities for controlling how element fragments should be rendered across multiple lines, columns, or pages.

content.title: Box Sizing
content.description: Utilities for controlling how the browser should calculate an element's total size.

content.title: Display
content.description: Utilities for controlling the display box type of an element.

content.title: Floats
content.description: Utilities for controlling the wrapping of content around an element.

content.title: Clear
content.description: Utilities for controlling the wrapping of content around an element.

content.title: Isolation
content.description: Utilities for controlling whether an element should explicitly create a new stacking context.

content.title: Object Fit
content.description: Utilities for controlling how a replaced element's content should be resized.

content.title: Object Position
content.description: Utilities for controlling how a replaced element's content should be positioned within its container.

content.title: Overflow
content.description: Utilities for controlling how an element handles content that is too large for the container.

content.title: Overscroll Behavior
content.description: Utilities for controlling how the browser behaves when reaching the boundary of a scrolling area.

content.title: Position
content.description: Utilities for controlling how an element is positioned in the DOM.

content.title: Top / Right / Bottom / Left
content.description: Utilities for controlling the placement of positioned elements.

content.title: Visibility
content.description: Utilities for controlling the visibility of an element.

content.title: Z-Index
content.description: Utilities for controlling the stack order of an element.

content.title: Flex Direction
content.description: Utilities for controlling the direction of flex items.

content.title: Flex Wrap
content.description: Utilities for controlling how flex items wrap.

content.title: Flex
content.description: Utilities for controlling how flex items both grow and shrink.

content.title: Flex Grow
content.description: Utilities for controlling how flex items grow.

content.title: Flex Shrink
content.description: Utilities for controlling how flex items shrink.

content.title: Order
content.description: Utilities for controlling the order of flex and grid items.

content.title: Grid Template Columns
content.description: Utilities for specifying the columns in a grid layout.

content.title: Grid Column Start / End
content.description: Utilities for controlling how elements are sized and placed across grid columns.

content.title: Grid Template Rows
content.description: Utilities for specifying the rows in a grid layout.

content.title: Grid Row Start / End
content.description: Utilities for controlling how elements are sized and placed across grid rows.

content.title: Grid Auto Flow
content.description: Utilities for controlling how elements in a grid are auto-placed.

content.title: Grid Auto Columns
content.description: Utilities for controlling the size of implicitly-created grid columns.

content.title: Grid Auto Rows
content.description: Utilities for controlling the size of implicitly-created grid rows.

content.title: Gap
content.description: Utilities for controlling gutters between grid and flexbox items.

content.title: Justify Content
content.description: Utilities for controlling how flex and grid items are positioned along a container's main axis.

content.title: Justify Items
content.description: Utilities for controlling how grid items are aligned along their inline axis.

content.title: Justify Self
content.description: Utilities for controlling how an individual grid item is aligned along its inline axis.

content.title: Align Content
content.description: Utilities for controlling how rows are positioned in multi-row flex and grid containers.

content.title: Align Items
content.description: Utilities for controlling how flex and grid items are positioned along a container's cross axis.

content.title: Align Self
content.description: Utilities for controlling how an individual flex or grid item is positioned along its container's cross axis.

content.title: Place Content
content.description: Utilities for controlling how content is justified and aligned at the same time.

content.title: Place Items
content.description: Utilities for controlling how items are justified and aligned at the same time.

content.title: Place Self
content.description: Utilities for controlling how an individual item is justified and aligned at the same time.

content.title: Padding
content.description: Utilities for controlling an element's padding.

content.title: Margin
content.description: Utilities for controlling an element's margin.

content.title: Space Between
content.description: Utilities for controlling the space between child elements.

content.title: Width
content.description: Utilities for setting the width of an element

content.title: Min-Width
content.description: Utilities for setting the minimum width of an element

content.title: Max-Width
content.description: Utilities for setting the maximum width of an element

content.title: Height
content.description: Utilities for setting the height of an element

content.title: Min-Height
content.description: Utilities for setting the minimum height of an element

content.title: Max-Height
content.description: Utilities for setting the maximum height of an element

content.title: Font Family
content.description: Utilities for controlling the font family of an element.
table: font-family: ui-sans-serif, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, "Noto Sans", sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji";
font-family: ui-serif, Georgia, Cambria, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
font-family: ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, "Liberation Mono", "Courier New", monospace;

content.title: Font Size
content.description: Utilities for controlling the font size of an element.

content.title: Font Smoothing
content.description: Utilities for controlling the font smoothing of an element.

content.title: Font Style
content.description: Utilities for controlling the style of text.

content.title: Font Weight
content.description: Utilities for controlling the font weight of an element.

content.title: Font Variant Numeric
content.description: Utilities for controlling the variant of numbers.

content.title: Letter Spacing
content.description: Utilities for controlling the tracking (letter spacing) of an element.

content.title: Line Height
content.description: Utilities for controlling the leading (line height) of an element.

content.title: List Style Type
content.description: Utilities for controlling the bullet/number style of a list.

content.title: List Style Position
content.description: Utilities for controlling the position of bullets/numbers in lists.

content.title: Placeholder Color
content.description: Utilities for controlling the color of placeholder text.

content.title: Placeholder Opacity
content.description: Utilities for controlling the opacity of an element's placeholder color.

content.title: Text Align
content.description: Utilities for controlling the alignment of text.

content.title: Text Color
content.description: Utilities for controlling the text color of an element.

content.title: Text Opacity
content.description: Utilities for controlling the opacity of an element's text color.

content.title: Text Decoration
content.description: Utilities for controlling the decoration of text.

content.title: Text Transform
content.description: Utilities for controlling the transformation of text.

content.title: Text Overflow
content.description: Utilities for controlling text overflow in an element.

content.title: Vertical Align
content.description: Utilities for controlling the vertical alignment of an inline or table-cell box.

content.title: Whitespace
content.description: Utilities for controlling an element's white-space property.

content.title: Word Break
content.description: Utilities for controlling word breaks in an element.

content.title: Background Attachment
content.description: Utilities for controlling how a background image behaves when scrolling.

content.title: Background Clip
content.description: Utilities for controlling the bounding box of an element's background.

content.title: Background Color
content.description: Utilities for controlling an element's background color.

content.title: Background Opacity
content.description: Utilities for controlling the opacity of an element's background color.

content.title: Background Origin
content.description: Utilities for controlling how an element's background is positioned relative to borders, padding, and content.

content.title: Background Position
content.description: Utilities for controlling the position of an element's background image.

content.title: Background Repeat
content.description: Utilities for controlling the repetition of an element's background image.

content.title: Background Size
content.description: Utilities for controlling the background size of an element's background image.

content.title: Background Image
content.description: Utilities for controlling an element's background image.

content.title: Gradient Color Stops
content.description: Utilities for controlling the color stops in background gradients.

content.title: Border Radius
content.description: Utilities for controlling the border radius of an element.

content.title: Border Width
content.description: Utilities for controlling the width of an element's borders.

content.title: Border Color
content.description: Utilities for controlling the color of an element's borders.

content.title: Border Opacity
content.description: Utilities for controlling the opacity of an element's border color.

content.title: Border Style
content.description: Utilities for controlling the style of an element's borders.

content.title: Divide Width
content.description: Utilities for controlling the border width between elements.

content.title: Divide Color
content.description: Utilities for controlling the border color between elements.

content.title: Divide Opacity
content.description: Utilities for controlling the opacity borders between elements.

content.title: Divide Style
content.description: Utilities for controlling the border style between elements.

content.title: Ring Width
content.description: Utilities for creating outline rings with box-shadows.

content.title: Ring Color
content.description: Utilities for setting the color of outline rings.

content.title: Ring Opacity
content.description: Utilities for setting the opacity of outline rings.

content.title: Ring Offset Width
content.description: Utilities for simulating an offset when adding outline rings.

content.title: Ring Offset Color
content.description: Utilities for setting the color of outline ring offsets.

content.title: Box Shadow
content.description: Utilities for controlling the box shadow of an element.
table:
--tw-shadow: 0 1px 3px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 1px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
box-shadow: var(--tw-ring-offset-shadow, 0 0 #0000), var(--tw-ring-shadow, 0 0 #0000), var(--tw-shadow);

--tw-shadow: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
box-shadow: var(--tw-ring-offset-shadow, 0 0 #0000), var(--tw-ring-shadow, 0 0 #0000), var(--tw-shadow);

--tw-shadow: 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 4px 6px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
box-shadow: var(--tw-ring-offset-shadow, 0 0 #0000), var(--tw-ring-shadow, 0 0 #0000), var(--tw-shadow);

--tw-shadow: 0 20px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 10px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);
box-shadow: var(--tw-ring-offset-shadow, 0 0 #0000), var(--tw-ring-shadow, 0 0 #0000), var(--tw-shadow);

--tw-shadow: inset 0 2px 4px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
box-shadow: var(--tw-ring-offset-shadow, 0 0 #0000), var(--tw-ring-shadow, 0 0 #0000), var(--tw-shadow);

content.title: Opacity
content.description: Utilities for controlling the opacity of an element.

content.title: Mix Blend Mode
content.description: Utilities for controlling how an element should blend with the background.

content.title: Background Blend Mode
content.description: Utilities for controlling how an element's background image should blend with its background color.

content.title: Filter
content.description: Utilities for enabling and disabling filters on an element.
table: filter: var(--tw-blur) var(--tw-brightness) var(--tw-contrast) var(--tw-grayscale) var(--tw-hue-rotate) var(--tw-invert) var(--tw-saturate) var(--tw-sepia) var(--tw-drop-shadow);

content.title: Blur
content.description: Utilities for applying blur filters to an element.

content.description: Utilities for applying brightness filters to an element.

content.description: Utilities for applying contrast filters to an element.

content.title: Drop Shadow
content.description: Utilities for applying drop-shadow filters to an element.

content.description: Utilities for applying grayscale filters to an element.

content.description: Utilities for applying hue-rotate filters to an element.

content.title: Invert
content.description: Utilities for applying invert filters to an element.

content.title: Saturate
content.description: Utilities for applying saturation filters to an element.

content.title: Sepia
content.description: Utilities for applying sepia filters to an element.

content.description: Utilities for enabling and disabling backdrop filters on an element.
table: backdrop-filter: var(--tw-backdrop-blur) var(--tw-backdrop-brightness) var(--tw-backdrop-contrast) var(--tw-backdrop-grayscale) var(--tw-backdrop-hue-rotate) var(--tw-backdrop-invert) var(--tw-backdrop-opacity) var(--tw-backdrop-saturate) var(--tw-backdrop-sepia);

content.description: Utilities for applying backdrop blur filters to an element.

content.description: Utilities for applying backdrop brightness filters to an element.

content.description: Utilities for applying backdrop contrast filters to an element.

content.description: Utilities for applying backdrop grayscale filters to an element.

content.description: Utilities for applying backdrop hue-rotate filters to an element.

content.description: Utilities for applying backdrop invert filters to an element.

content.description: Utilities for applying backdrop opacity filters to an element.

content.description: Utilities for applying backdrop saturation filters to an element.

content.description: Utilities for applying backdrop sepia filters to an element.

content.description: Utilities for controlling whether table borders should collapse or be separated.

content.description: Utilities for controlling which CSS properties transition.

content.description: Utilities for controlling the duration of CSS transitions.

content.description: Utilities for controlling the easing of CSS transitions.

content.description: Utilities for controlling the delay of CSS transitions.

content.description: Utilities for animating elements with CSS animations.

content.title: Transform
content.description: Utilities for controlling transform behaviour.

content.title: Transform Origin
content.description: Utilities for specifying the origin for an element's transformations.

content.title: Scale
content.description: Utilities for scaling elements with transform.

content.title: Rotate
content.description: Utilities for rotating elements with transform.

content.title: Translate
content.description: Utilities for translating elements with transform.

content.title: Appearance
content.description: Utilities for suppressing native form control styling.

content.description: Utilities for controlling the cursor style when hovering over an element.

content.description: Utilities for controlling whether an element responds to pointer events.

content.description: Utilities for styling the fill of SVG elements.

content.description: Utilities for styling the stroke of SVG elements.

content.description: Utilities for styling the stroke width of SVG elements.
